name: Rhythmetallic – Tap the Beat
description:
Do you love tap rhythm games, but you are tired of the same old pop or edm music?
Want a rhythm metal and rock game with the classic tap tap music gameplay?

Try Rhythmetallic – heavy metal tap music rhythm game. This tap tap music guitar game leads you on a fun music tapping adventure filled with original heavy metal music that is sure to satisfy your taste.

◆ DIVERSE METAL GENRES
Start your Rhythmetallic metal journey and explore multiple heavy metal rhythm genres. See the exact metal genre before you play the rhythm game. Complete them all with the highest score possible and show that you are the #1 tap music master.

◆ CLASSIC RHYTHM GAME
Enjoy a dark-themed environment and graphics accompanied by a classic tap rhythm gameplay. Show speed, ability to feel the rhythm, and be precise just like you are a member of the rock band playing the song.

◆ TOP THE LEADERBOARDS
For an added thrill, our heavy metal song rhythm game features a global leaderboard of tap rhythm masters just like you. Top the leaderboard and show that you are a skilful rock guitar player that can match the energy and darkness of heavy metal.

◆ FEATURES:
◉ Diverse metal music genres
◉ Expanding collection of metal music
◉ Arrange levels by name or difficulty
◉ Different worlds to explore
◉ Purchase gems for a better experience
◉ Global leaderboards
◉ Control the Master, Music, and SFX Volume
◉ Control the Note Speed
◉ Control the frame rate

Now it’s time to break out of the ordinary and enjoy a heavy metal music rhythm game.

►Play Rhythmetallic for FREE.
